fields.description:
ERIK LOPEZ

+19123397943

cproxy3366314326658

External Unique Id: Dd8EViuQ4Jh-9_hqR-5cE

Hi team I spoke with Erik Lopez this weekend as follow up about his notifications:

!image-20230521-183115.png|width=1714,height=796!

CH Erik Lopez entered his WA and he confirmed that he is using the phone number +19123397943.

 We sent two WA messages to +17076406408( 1 and SALDO) and he was able to see the profile picture of Tarjeta Ganaz. He also stated that both of his messages appeared with two checks, next to the hour ( 8:36 pm and 8:40 EST zone) so it means we should have received them, but he did not receive a response.

We tried to send a screenshot to [hola@tarjetaganaz.com|mailto:hola@tarjetaganaz.com] from his SMS and it sounds like he did the correct process, but we did not receive it in FD. 

I do not know what is wrong. Can you please assist? Is there anything else we should ask?

TIA.

comments.body:
[~accountid:642b1df702931fca47bde0c5] [~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] this is a perfect opportunity to have the CH send us a unique, arbitrary number, 145145, whatever, that we can then look for in the Twilio logs and find out what the CH’s actual number is and how they are messaging us.

In the Twilio logs, we have never received a message from {{whatsapp:+19123397943}} and every message we’ve tried to send to that number has encountered the dreaded Error 63003, channel could not find to address.

The CH has a US number. I do see a single SMS from the user saying “saldo”.

In terms of next steps we can confirm the CH’s actual whatsapp number either by the method below, or by having the CH send a unique number or string for us to find in the logs because it still seems like there’s confusion.
[https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number|https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number|smart-link]  

!Screen Shot 2023-05-22 at 8.25.20 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!

!Screen Shot 2023-05-22 at 8.25.01 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!

!Screen Shot 2023-05-22 at 8.26.23 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!
Thank you, Dan. We did discuss this new process last week, but it still needs to be completed with this case, so a member of our team will reach back to Erik about this.
ticket can stay in-review till we hear back
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] any idea if we’ve reached back out to Erik yet?
Hi [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08] thanks for the follow-up. We tried reaching out three times, with no success. We can close this ticket for now.

fields.description:
JOSE GUADALUPE FLORES ROSALES

cproxy3366314612716

*+523412415560* Whatsapp notifications

He is not receiving the link to access his portal in WA. We did troubleshooting, I confirmed our number is correct [+*+1-707-640-6408*+|], his number *+523412415560 in Qolo is correct. We send four commands (SALDO, 1, MOV, START) and the messages showed two checks, so he did not have problems with his signal or cellular data.* 

*He sent 12345.* 

Can you please assist? TIA!

comments.body:
[~accountid:642b1df702931fca47bde0c5]  this CH has whatsapp. The phone number for Whatsapp is not necessarily the phone number for SMS, in Whatsapp you can set it up differently. 

AFAIK we have not received any messages from +523412415560  at all. 
1. is the CH texting from SMS or from Whatsapp? 
2. if it’s from Whatsapp, have we verified in Whatsapp what the number is configured to be?
[https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number/|https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number/|smart-link] for reference.

Hi [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] 

# He is texting from WA, he has been receiving WA notifications before with the same number and WA, because he was able to use remittances. 
# Yes, I invited him to enter his WA and he shared with me the phone number he has under his profile picture, it is the same as in Qolo.
[~accountid:642b1df702931fca47bde0c5]  I don’t see any messages coming in during to {{+17076406408}} that time frame that has 12345 in the body from any phone number.
[~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] ch confirmed he’s now receiving the link. He’s an AT&T user.
thanks [~accountid:62b1de5fdcafd965c5ddeb7b]  it sounds like we can close this ticket
overall, this was interesting as we didn’t make any change

items.fromString:
UBALDO NAVA FLORES

Lzz3OJfCocdHn60pJQSSC

cproxy4293106387269

Cardholder had a US number for his account and SMS notifications. [~accountid:62b1de5fdcafd965c5ddeb7b] helped him change his number to a new Mexican number. When the cardholder tried to send the word SALDO from WhatsApp (to therefore switch his preferences from SMS to WhatsApp) he still received the response in SMS, and not WhatsApp.

Therefore, the ability to automatically switch notification preferences didn’t work as expected.

For context:

Old number: +15419934675

New number: +523414118721

Please advise. Thank you.
items.toString:

Name: UBALDO NAVA FLORES

Lzz3OJfCocdHn60pJQSSC

cproxy4293106387269

Cardholder had a US number for his account and SMS notifications. [~accountid:62b1de5fdcafd965c5ddeb7b] helped him change his number to a new Mexican number. When the cardholder tried to send the word SALDO from WhatsApp (to therefore switch his preferences from SMS to WhatsApp) he still received the response in SMS, and not WhatsApp.

Therefore, the ability to automatically switch notification preferences didn’t work as expected.

For context:

Old number: +15419934675

New number: +523414118721

Please advise. Thank you.
fields.summary: CH unable to switch notification preference

comments.body:
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620]  if I understand the ticket correctly there might be a mismatch between SMS and Whatsapp phone numbers. The automatic switching will not work then. The Whatsapp and the SMS phone number must be the same for this to work. 

I’m tagging [~accountid:70121:94de06e1-3a62-4bdc-9c30-7c013a9670ab]  also in case I’ve misunderstood something about this.

Currently the “new number” is set and message preferences are also set to SMS. 
Do you want me to force-change this to whatsapp [~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] ?
Hi [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] , yes, pelase switch the new MX number to WhatsApp. I think you are correct about this only being for +1 numbers, now that I am reviewing the notes.
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] I’ve changed the medium to whatsapp and have clarified this with Ragan also see the linked ticket
Understood, thank you [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] !

fields.description:
*KEVIN BRYAN LOPEZ SANTIAGO*

*cproxy1425619608768*

*+17048329926*

CH called because he wasn't receiving notifications, we ran some troubleshooting sending the word SALDO, START and he didn't receive anything. CH sent 12345.

comments.body:
Hi [~accountid:62b1de5fdcafd965c5ddeb7b] 
I see the 12345 being received in twilio and that we are responding as well. 

I also see other commands that the person has sent and our response. 
incoming: 2023-05-29  14:59:54 MDT *saldo*
response: 2023-05-29  14:59:57 MDT su saldo es ….

2023-05-29 14:59:09 MDT *start* 

2023-05-29 14:59:12 MDT estamos aqui para ayudarle…. 

----

There are a few things that could be going on

# they should be on SMS. if they are texting from whatsapp then that could be a problem 
# if it's SMS, then possible their  carrier is blocking the message

From our side, it looks like it works.
Thank you [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] . We will try to reach out to this CH today. Is there any way ENG can confirm what number they are texting?

I cannot see in twilio if the CH is texting from WhatsApp or SMS. I’ve filed a ticket with Twilio for that. 

AFAIK the person is texting from sms to the right Ganaz number and we are replying as we should. 

I can take a look at our error logs to see if something is showing up there too. 

I’ll move the ticket back to in-progress until that’s completed.
Understood, thank you!
I don’t see anything particular in the error logs. The messages from Twilio are marked as {{delivered}}
Thank you, [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] ! That’s good to know!
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620]  I’m closing this ticket as I don’t see any further action on our end. If there’s something we need to investigate further then I’m happy to reopen it.
Thank you, [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] . We are trying to reach out to this CH today, and will reopen the ticket if need be.

fields.description:
HUGO SANCHEZ

I changed his phone# in QOLO, while running the test he didn’t received the answer for his balance, he received “ we are sorry but can’t recognized this phone# “ I asked if he had another acct linked to his WA account and he said no. Can you please help up with this case?

External Unique Id: oCsfZUYyNpyUG5v_xumMh

cproxy0729494703611

comments.body:
[~accountid:636e6ef3c87c50433009887b] did you walk the cardholder through checking their Whatsapp number or just ask them?

[https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number/|https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number/|smart-link] 

We have *never* received *any* messages from his number on file. When we try to send messages to his number on file we receive the dreaded *Error 63003 cannot find channel*, which most likely means he has a different number connected to Whatsapp than he thinks.


!Screen Shot 2023-05-17 at 9.05.43 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!

!Screen Shot 2023-05-17 at 9.05.30 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!



h2. [ERROR - 63003|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#error-63003]

h3. [Channel could not find To address|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#channel-could-not-find-to-address]

You have tried to send a message to a To address that is inactive or invalid.

h4. [Possible Causes|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#possible-causes]

* The To address is no invalid or longer belongs to a mobile user
* The To address was entered or formatted incorrectly

h4. [Possible Solutions|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#possible-solutions]

* Ensure you have provided the correct To address for the user you are trying to reach
* Ensure that the To address is still active

Hi [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08] I’m seeing your screenshots were using a number that was outdated, and had been updated by Dianne. I added the Qolo info here. The correct phone number is *+18632203577*. Can you please confirm that this number is *_also_* not associated with a WhatsApp account?

!Screenshot 2023-05-17 at 10.44.20.png|width=552,height=403!

!Screenshot 2023-05-17 at 10.44.40.png|width=1588,height=121!

[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] his phone number is wrong in his cardholder record in our db then, it’s currently {{+18032203577}}

I do see messages from the user coming from {{+18632203577}} so I’ve updated the cardholder’s phone number in our database.

Please follow-up with the user, I expect this is resolved now.

[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] [~accountid:5b5631f96366b42ca0ded60d] this is an example of where having the cardholder send us a unique number and putting it in the card would have exposed the issue more quickly since I could have looked and seen that the number was incorrect.
Thank you [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08] ! Do we know why the phone number wouldn’t have synced with the db?
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] I do not know why the number wouldn’t have updated in our db, [~accountid:5b5631f96366b42ca0ded60d] any idea?
This was probably changed during a timeframe when Qolo has a bug sending events. Nothing we can do about that.
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620]  [~accountid:636e6ef3c87c50433009887b]  I’ll go ahead and close this ticket.

fields.description:
As mentioned in [https://ganaz.atlassian.net/browse/GAN-5715|https://ganaz.atlassian.net/browse/GAN-5715|smart-link] , [~accountid:62b1de5fdcafd965c5ddeb7b]  called this CH, and explained she “let him know…that he should have access to the remittances platform but during the troubleshooting he mentioned he wasn't receiving the link when sending the world ENVIO and we tried with the word MOVIMIENTO so that he could enter his portal but the option ENVIAR DINERO didn't displayed.” She “asked him to please send the number 5678 if this helps, because he confirmed he was sending the money from his number.”



Can we please look up the 5678 message, and determine why this CH still isn’t able to access Remittances?
fields.summary: CH repeatedly not able to access remittances

comments.body: FYI [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513]
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620]  do we know when (day and PT time) that they texted 5678?
Hi [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] I looked back at it appears it was _Mon, 22 May 2023 at approximately 3:58 PST._

My understanding is that 
1. the CH can text and receive messages from us normally?  like {{BAL}}, correct?

[~accountid:636e6ef3c87c50433009887b]  + [~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] : some wires got crossed and 

{noformat}and CH has a H2A visa and needs to  have access to ECG{noformat}

was not completed correctly in GAN-5715.

 This is now done.  The cardholder should be able to to remittances now. 

Apologies for the confusion.
Thank you [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] !
[~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] CH now has access to the portal. Thank you!

[~accountid:5e78fdd1dde7030c4f0d3ddd]  should I tag you on all of these tickets so you know when someone new was added for remittances? Or does it not matter as much, since they asked for remittances (and already know about it?)
Please tag me in order to send them the welcome remittance message [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513]  anyway, before sending message I’ll double check they didn’t receive it twice by error
[~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08]  FYI let’s do this moving forward
